summary: adds a circlet to the daedric armour set
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to be able to use a circlet instead of the helmet for the Daedric armour (I just like the way it looks, especially if you're more of a mage)

It adds a circlet to the Daedric armour set so you'll still get the bonuses for wearing a full set, it can be made at the forge in the Daedric category, it can be tempered and enchanted and I have added it to the leveled lists so you may get luck and find one(at the same stage as the rest of the Daedric kit).

I plan to do the same for other armour sets so keep your eyes peeled for your favorite.

Comments, criticisms, advice, requests and barefaced flattery all welcome.

now more or less superseded by my Helmlets mod that includes circlets for all armour sets
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54106/?
author: MattyT9999
